title: New: Island Science – XII
content:
Love the intertwining vocals on this debut single from Island Science.

There’s definite comparisons to be made to Sylvan Esso and maybe even some of the more upbeat moments on Hundred Water’s The Moon Rang Like A Bell. Check out XII below.

Follow our Spotify On Repeat playlist for a hand-picked selection of the current hottest tracks.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
